title: Learning-by-Confusion (LbC)-Based Simulation Education for Strengthening ECG Interpretation Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Electrocardiography (ECG) Concepts and Medical Knowledge of Cardiovascular Diseases
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers experience complex ECG interpretation scenarios in simulated clinical environments via simulation/VR, gaining critical thinking and iterative learning through learning-transfer approaches

learning_goals: Learners accurately classify ECG patterns in 18 clinical scenarios and identify ≥80% of associated cardiovascular conditions.
Learners achieve ≥75% concordance in interpretations through peer consultation under conditions of diagnostic uncertainty.
Learners systematically analyze their diagnostic processes via reflective journaling and identify ≥3 error patterns.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
